plot: The images of the condemnation and execution of dictator Nicolae Ceausescu and his wife Elena on Christmas Day in 1989 are etched deeply in the collective unconscious of several generations...
title: Die letzten Tage der Ceausescus
plot_es: The images of the condemnation and execution of dictator Nicolae Ceausescu and his wife Elena on Christmas Day in 1989 are etched deeply in the collective unconscious of several generations...
plot_en: The images of the condemnation and execution of dictator Nicolae Ceausescu and his wife Elena on Christmas Day in 1989 are etched deeply in the collective unconscious of several generations...
